articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: Well.. not like the other one ! ! !
articles.contents:
This picture was taken the day of my Masters graduation ceremony at Shiga University, Japan. I’m now a proud Ph.D. Student of the GSID of Nagoya University, Japan.Hello guys ! ! !
I’m Othniel.. but here you surely gonna call me Lulus.. I am a proud Ph.D. Student of the Graduate School of International Development of Nagoya-University (one of the best here in Japan :) ) and well his is a place where we are gonna have fun learning R.. yes R.. yes.. yes.. R haha.. the kind of intimidating but very nice statistical software..
I promise.. I will take step by step.. you are gonna love it sure.. I promise.. promise..
For more details..
For more about me please visit my personal website.
Now let’s get started!
